transcript:
Customer: Hello

Jo bolti hai wo acha nahi lagta.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello hello
Customer: Ji sir
Executive: Haan ji mam
Customer: Mam koi baat nahi aap bataye.
Executive: Dekhiye main aapko please main ek cheez bol rahi hu ki images na aapko main share karungi. Thik hai?
Customer: Aapki product ke regarding.
Executive: Alright.
Customer: Mam aap karoge main then and there mein bata dunga. Maine aapka jo jo whatsapp group hai na usko main ping karke sabse upar rakha hua hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Ji right right.
Customer: Thik hai na?
Customer: Aap mere ko do char panch das do jitne bhi dene hai do mere ko aap. Thik hai na?
Executive: Haan main aapko waha pe bilkul share karungi sir lekin ye mera concern hai ki jaise aap lead ko na consume karte ho contact banao pe click karke. Thik hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usme aisa nahi hai ki aapko turant calls aana start ho jayega. Usse aapki listing.
Customer: Mam aisa hai aisa hai aap dekho suniye suniye suniye suniye. Dekho aap mere ko time frame bata do ki kitne samay mein aane lagegi. Panch din, 10 din, 15 din, ek mahina, do mahina ya next contract pe.
Executive: Ji ji.
Executive: No no not at all sir. Atleast 15 days ka time isme lagega listing create hone mein. Do hafte ka time isme jata hai.
Customer: Mam take 30 days. Take 30 days. Today is aaj 11 tarikh hai.
Customer: Thik hai na? 11 November hai. Thik hai na? 11 December tak aap daily aap ye cheez karo main bhi ek karta hu. Aaj thik hai na? Mere ko incoming calls wala hi chahiye. Thik hai na? Agar aapko lagta hai ki 30 days mein aane lag jayega I am ready to do that. I am ready to do that that. Thik hai?
Executive: Right.
Executive: That's fine. Second thing second thing second thing second thing. Agar is 30 dino mein thik hai na aapne agar 50% bhi apni improvement kar di thik hai na?
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Sure sir.
Customer: Thik hai na? Aur otherwise otherwise thik hai na? Do not expect any hai na renewal or recharge or what jo bhi aap technical bhasha mein bolte hain. Thik hai na?
Executive: Ji.
Executive: That that is it.
Customer: Ye abhi main aapke shabdon ko main apne usme ye aapka tat hai. Ke itne samay mein mere ko ye milegi aap aapki ye calls.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Alright alright alright. Don't worry about that.
Customer: Thik hai. Thank you mam. Thank you.
Customer: Iske alawa kuch aur?
Executive: Haan for sure sir. Aapke paas iske regarding ek feedback mail jayega sir. Thik hai please review.
Customer: Mam abhi main kuch nahi karunga abhi main kahunga bahut ganda remark dunga main abhi please feedback ki baat hi na kare. Do char din thik thak chalne de fir wo usme acha karenge.
Executive: Okay okay. I think one second one second sir that is for my resolution jo maine aapko abhi resolution diya.
Customer: Mam resolution dene ka koi matlab hi nahi hai ye to shabd ye mam aap Satyanarayan ki katha suna rahe hain. Ke Satyanarayan ki katha sunai hogi matha teko fal milega ek mahine baad.
Executive: Not at all sir.
Customer: Mam main main dekhiye mam main kuch nahi karne wala agar aap mere paas koi feedback mail aayegi main bahut hi kharab remark dalunga uske andar.
Customer: Thik hai na?
Customer: Kyunki kal mere ko bola gaya tha whatsapp group banayenge usme aapne aaj ek single lead share ki hai. Jo bhi mere kaam ki nahi hai. Voice call kuch nahi aayi hai mail se koi lead nahi mili hai.
Executive: Haan maine aapko wahi cheez bataya lead ka yaha pe aapko daily ki do ya teen buyleads per day share karungi.
Executive: Ab aisa nahi hai ki main ek sath hi aapko do ya teen buyleads share kar du.
Customer: Mam aisa hai mere ko nahi pata aap kaise kar rahe hain. Mere ko nahi pata ki aap kaise kar rahe hain.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai na?
Customer: Aapka algorithm kis tarike se kaam kar raha hai main nahi janta jabki mere sare product uske catalog pe hain.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Thik hai na?
Customer: Catalog mein sari cheeze hone ke bawajud bhi keywords wagera to AI ka zamana hai waise hi ho jayega.
Executive: Haan bilkul sir. Aap kuch keywords wagera bhi mere sath share karne wale the iske regarding.
Customer: Mam wo wo mere part ka hai main aapke sath share kar dunga. Thik hai mam.
Executive: Haan wo cheeze bhi mujhe aap share kar dijiyega usko main.
Customer: Main aapko kar deta hu aaj kar dunga.
Executive: Aaj.
Customer: Aaj kar dunga mam main.
Customer: Aapki email id mere ko whatsapp kar dijiyega us group mein na.
Executive: Main meri email id ek minute.
Customer: Haan hmm. Thik hai mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough relevant buyleads.

- Customer wants incoming calls.

- Customer is unhappy with the quality of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive assured daily sharing of 2-3 buyleads.

- Executive will share keywords with the customer.

- Customer agreed to wait 30 days for improvement.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share email ID on WhatsApp group.

- Executive to share keywords with customer today.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, whatsapp group, catalog, keywords, improvement
